attributes.action: That this government refuses to replace the royal crest with the European Flag on all birth, marriage and death certfiicates
attributes.additional_details:
All babies born in Britain could have the EU flag stamped on their birth certificate within three years.

Eric Pickles MP, Secretary of State for Communities said: "This plan, contained in the Lisbon Treaty, is part of a campaign to stamp the EU flag across all tiers of public administration and undermine nation states".

We the undersigned call on the Prime Minister and this government to refuse such measures and stop eroding our nations identity.
